com.simsilica.es.filter

Class OrFilter<T extends EntityComponent>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simsilica.es.filter.OrFilter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentFilter<T>

    public class OrFilter<T extends EntityComponent>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ComponentFilter<T>
    An OR filter that requires all component filters to be of the same type as the outer filter.
